name: WP e-Commerce Multilingual
author: OnTheGoSystems

sections.description:
This plugin handles all the little details required to run WP E-Commerce together with WPML, to produce complete e-commerce sites with WordPress.

To run, you will need to install WPEC 3.8.7 and above and WPML 2.4.1 and above.

New! Customize your e-commerce site using Types and Views

WP E-Commerce uses custom post types for products and categories. Now, you can customize your e-commerce site without coding using Types – The Custom Types and Custom Fields Plugin and Views – The Custom Content Display Plugin. Types and Views allow you to achieve a completely unique look for your site without coding. The two plugins are fully compatible with WP E-Commerce and WPML.

Need Support?

Please submit support requests to WPML forum. Remember to report:

  • The versions of WP E-Commerce, WPML and WordPress that you’re using.
  • A URL to your site, where we can see the problem happening.
  • A description of what you expect to see and what you’re seeing in practice.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Make sure that both WP E-Commerce and WPML are active. Without both of them, this plugin does nothing.
sections.faq:
Do I need to buy WPML to use this plugin?

Yes. This plugin needs functions that were only added to WPML 2.3.4, so you cannot use older versions with it.

short_description: Allows running complete multilingual e-commerce sites using the WP E-Commerce and WPML.
